FOREWARD
This paper was authored by Margaret Wu of the Assessment Research Centre, University of
Melbourne, with contributions from Professor Kaye Stacey, University of Melbourne, and her team in
classifying PISA and TIMSS items, and in providing references and comments for the manuscript.
The author would like to express her thanks to Professor Patrick Griffin for reading the manuscript
and for providing comments.
